title.narrative: Promotion of Earth and Human Heritage of Ngorongoro by Valorization of the Oldupai and Laetoli sites, local communities development and creation of the Ngorongoro Geopark

description.narrative: The overall objectives of the Action are:i.To promote the heritage sites of Laetoli and Oldupai Gorge in order to create new activities and to improve the valorization of both sites in order to satisfy the public;ii.To empower local communities and include them into local management and conservation of the sites;iii.To sustain the valorization of the World Heretage (WH) sites by creation of the Ngorongoro Geopark.

title.narrative: Status of the candidature dossier to UNESCO to obtain the Global Geopark Status

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.
